name: Ashton - Classic Series - Panetela
additionalNotes: Ashton Classic Cigars are a beautiful compilation of Dominican tobaccos blended by Carlos Fuente Jr. The Ashton Classic cigar is made with the finest 3 to 4 year old Dominican filler and binder tobaccos and is enveloped by a flawless Connecticut shade wrapper creating a complex, full flavored experience. Starting off with a slight peppery note, this creamy, mild smoke wonâ€™t fall short of your expectations.
